qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Hi, ${USER.NAME}! Thank you for participating in this survey. This questionnaire regards the usability of Ach So! Android application. Your responses will be used to improve the application’s user interface and make it more efficient and user friendly. Filling in this questionnaire will take approximately 15 minutes.

qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Think about your experience with the Ach So! application and evaluate the following statements. There is a space at the end of the questionnaire for you to elaborate and specify your answers and give feedback for further improvements.

qu:Page.name: Shooting Video
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Recording function reacts fast enough.

qu:Page.name: Shooting Video
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: After I finish recording a video, it makes sense to me to choose a category for it right away.

qu:Page.name: Shooting Video
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I understood what the different categories for the videos mean and it was easy to choose the right one for my video.

qu:Page.name: Shooting Video
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: After I have chosen a category for the video, it’s logical that the application goes back to My videos.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The timeline slider reacts well to my dragging.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: When annotating a video, the marker appears fast enough when I press the screen.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: When adding text to an annotation, the keyboard appears when I need it to.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: When dragging an annotation marker, it moves fast enough and according to my touch.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: When watching an annotated video I can pause the video when an annotation is on the screen.

qu:Page.name: Viewing Videos and Annotating
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Editing and deleting an annotation is easy.

qu:Page.name: Improvements and Comments
